name: Krsc Reports PHPExcel Framework

short_description: It allows to write code for creating part of worksheets, which can be used across many files. It supports generating files with many worksheets and styles. It is easy to extend library with own functionality. In order to run, this project needs PHPExcel. Put PHPExcel source in Classes folder. Then load in your browser Examples.php file from the main folder and see the possibilities of this library. Live demo is here: http://www.ruszczynski.eu/krsc/Examples.php . For documentation, see https://github.com/krzysztofruszczynski/Krsc-Reports-PHPExcel-Framework/blob/master/README.md
summary: Php library written in order to create complex PHPExcel files.
